function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of systematic testing and monitoring","Impact":"Increased risk of undetected infection spread","Mitigation":"Implement systematic testing and monitoring of employees and patients","Technologies":"Testing technologies for COVID-19 detection","People":"Medical staff, employees, patients","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Inadequate use of PPE and hygiene practices","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission within the workplace","Mitigation":"Enforce strict adherence to PPE and hygiene protocols, provide education and training","Technologies":"PPE, hygiene monitoring technologies","People":"Employees, visitors, medical staff","Owner":"Employers, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Lack of contact tracing and quarantine measures","Impact":"Inability to contain outbreaks and identify potential sources of transmission","Mitigation":"Implement contact tracing protocols, enforce quarantine for close contacts of infected individuals","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technologies","People":"Employees, visitors, high-risk groups","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers"}]}
